Instances.input: To easily prep garlic.
output: Remove the outer layers of skin and break the garlic into individual cloves. Place cloves in a large Tupperware container (I used an old coffee tub). Shake your container as hard as you can for about a minute or two, then check out your garlic. Most of the skins should come right off the cloves. If not, give them another quick shake. Some may still need to be pealed by hand, but I guarantee this will save you a lot of time prepping your garlic.

Instances.input: How to clean car battery Terminals?
output: Open the hood and locate the car battery. loosen the nuts on the clamps using a wrench. Once loosened remove the negative clamp, marked with a "-" first. It is very important the order. Only after the negative clamp is removed, remove the positive clamp, marked with a "+". Combine 2–3 tablespoons of baking soda with a tablespoons or so of water. Stir to make a paste. Apply the baking soda paste to the battery connections. Be careful, although baking soda is generally safe, you should take care not to get it on other car components or on your self. Once the baking soda is applied, you will see it bubble and foam, as it reacts with the corrosion. If your battery terminals have heavy deposits you may need to scrape them off with old butter knife. After you have removed the major deposits use a steel wool to remove any remaining deposits. Rinse the connection using a little water. Be careful not to rinse the the baking soda paste into the battery vents, as the baking soda can neutralize the battery's acid and shorten the battery's life. Wipe the terminals clean with a dry clean rag. Add something hydrophobic, such as petroleum jelly (vaseline) or grease to the now cleaned terminals. This will help slow future corrosion. Put on the positive clamp first, then the negative clamp. Use a wrench to tighten if needed. Once the clamps are on, replace the rubber or plastic shields covering the clamp/terminal junction.

output: Microwave 1 cup each sugar and honey in a microwave-safe glass measuring cup until a candy thermometer reaches 290 degrees F, 10 to 15 minutes. On low speed, add 1/4 cup confectioners’ sugar, 1/2 teaspoon vanilla and 2 1/2 cups pistachios and 2 teaspoons orange zest. Transfer to an oiled parchment paper-lined baking sheet; flatten to 1 inch thick with a rolling pin. Cool 2 hours, then cut into squares.

Instances.input: What are the steps to clean old metal fixtures?
output: Remove fixtures from antique.        Place in the kitchen sink or large bowl.        Pour white or apple cider vinegar that is 5% acidity into the sink with the fixtures.        Put some ketchup in with the vinegar.        Let the fixtures soak for a few hours.        Wearing gloves, take each fixture and put some extra ketchup on them and scrub them using an old tooth brush. The ketchup helps make a paste to scrub the extra rust off.        After scrubbing each fixture, place them back in the vinegar solution and let them rest a few more hours.        Scrub more if necessary.        Remove from vinegar solution, rinse off with water, and immediately dry with a cloth or paper towel afterwards. If you don't dry them they will oxidize again with the water and create more rust.

Instances.input: How to clean wall clock battery Terminals?
output: Take down the clock from wall and remove the batteries. Use a damp soft cotton swab to remove any major corrosion deposits. Wear vinyl gloves while cleaning any battery corrosion. Make your cleaning agent by combine 1 tablespoon of baking soda with a teaspoon or so of water. Stir to make a paste. Apply the baking soda paste to the battery connections using a cotton swab or small piece of cloth. Once the baking soda is applied, you may see it bubble and foam, as it reacts with the corrosion. When the foaming stops and there are no major deposits left to be scraped out. Rinse the connections by using just a little water applied with a cotton swab. Be very careful not to get any water any electrical components. Wipe the terminals clean with a dry clean rag. Add some petroleum jelly to the cleaned terminals. Put new batteries into the now clean battery cradle, and close up the case or put back on the cover.

If it finds your iPhone, it will display a 6-digit code on its screen. Select “Add your phone” from the SYNC menu and then press "OK". SYNC will state “Press OK to begin pairing your device,” so press “OK” again. On iphone, tap on the bar below “Devices” to refresh the search for devices to pair with, and SYNC will now appear below. Instances.input: How to Kill Hydra in a Freshwater Aquarium
output: Hydra are related to jellyfish and are a common pest in home aquariums. Hydra are not generally harmful to fish, except they do have the ability to catch and consume small fry and shrimplets. Hydra are usually an indication of overfeeding, so feeding smaller quantities less often will help put a dent in their populations but their populations can be knocked out completely with a dose of common dog dewormer, available over the counter called Fenbendazole. Dose 0.1g fenbendazole per 10g of water volume. For heavy infestations, monitor water quality carefully after treatment to monitor for harmful ammonia spikes from decaying hydra.

output: 1/2 cup butter (1 stick)    1 cup sugar    1/2 cup evaporated milk        Melt butter in a large saucepan. Place evaporated milk in a large microwaveable dish/glass measure cup. Instances.input: How to remove stain from wood counter-tops?

Apply the iron to the area of the cloth covering the stain for a very brief moment. Use a piece of 120-grit sandpaper to gently sand your wooden counter-tops. Remember to sand with the grain. After giving it a good once over with the 120-grit paper, switch to a piece of 180-grit sandpaper and sand the counter-tops, again keeping with the natural grain of the wood. Once you finish sanding,  apply food-safe mineral oil and rub it into the wood grain with a clean rag. Let it soak into the wood for about 30 minutes, and then wipe away any excess mineral oil residue with a paper towel.

Instances.input: How to weave a belt.

Instances.input: How to remove scratch from the glass?
output: Wash off the glass using a clean cloth, making sure the glass is clear of all debris. Allow the glass to dry before attempting to fix the scratch. Hold a clean, lint-free cloth under a faucet of lukewarm water. Squeeze the cloth until no more excess moisture drips from it. Squeeze the tube until a pellet size of toothpaste comes out. Place the cloth and the drop of toothpaste on the scratched area. Move the cloth in small, circular motions for 30 seconds. Check the area to see how it looks. You may need several applications of toothpaste in order to minimize the scratch. Repeat the steps, applying a drop of toothpaste to the towel and wiping it on the scratch in a circular motion for 30 seconds. Get a fresh, clean cloth and wet it under the faucet. Squeeze out the excess moisture again, then take the damp cloth and pass it once over the glass. This makes the glass shine.

Instances.input: how to make basic risotto
output: Heat 4 cups chicken broth and 3 cups water in a saucepan. Heat 1/4 cup olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add 1 cup chopped leeks and 1/2 cup chopped shallots and cook until tender, 5 minutes. Add 2 cups arborio rice and 1 teaspoon kosher salt and toast, stirring, 1 minute. Add 3/4 cup white wine and simmer until absorbed. Stir in enough warm broth to cover the rice; continue to cook, stirring occasionally and adding more broth as needed to keep the rice covered, until al dente, 18 to 20 minutes. Remove from the heat and stir in 1 cup grated parmesan, 1/4 cup chopped parsley and 2 tablespoons butter. Season with salt and pepper.

Clean tools are important for separating aloe pups, in order to prevent contamination by disease and pests and produce a clean surface that will mesh quickly with the planting medium. Plant the newly removed pup in dry cacti potting mix or make your own with one part potting soil and one part sand. Allow it to sit for one week, then water the soil. Instances.input: How do I check to see if my plants need water?
output: Perform the finger test. Stick a finger in the soil up to your first knuckle and notice if the soil is moist enough. If your finger can’t even enter the soil, it definitely needs to be watered. If you reach an inch or so deep but your finger is completely dry, it probably needs water. If the top inch feels fairly moist, and some of the dirt sticks to your finger, it probably has enough water.

Instances.input: How To Make Banana Bread from Scratch

Add two eggs, beaten and combine. In a Separate bowl, crush four overripe bananas with a potato masher. Add bananas to butter mixture, add 2 teaspoons vanilla. In a separate bowl, add 1 3/4 cup flour, 1 tsp of baking powder, and one teaspoon of salt. Whisk together with a fork and add to butter mixture. Mix thoroughly. Instances.input: To add a cinnamon swirl into your loaf of bread
output: After the first proving, before it goes into the loaf pan, roll the dough out into a flat rectangle. Using a butter knife, spread very soft butter across the top two thirds of the rectangle, leaving about a third unbuttered at the bottom. Sprinkle your chosen swirl mixture onto the buttered bread--cheese, and cinnamon brown sugar are good choices, or you could even spread the dough with garlic butter. Then, starting with the uppermost buttered edge and working your way along the length of the rectangle, tightly roll your dough back up with your hands until it's completely rolled. Pinch the bottom edge to the rolled loaf with your fingers. Place in the loaf pan for its final proving.

Instances.input: How do you cook mashed yams?
output: Wash, peel, trim, and cut into large chunks 4 medium sized yams. Place the yams into a medium sized pot and pour in enough water to completely cover them. Mix in ½ teaspoon of salt. Place the pot on the stove and turn it on, then bring the mixture to a boil. Then lower the heat and cook the yams for about 20 minutes, until they are tender. While the yams are cooking, mix together ½ cup milk and 2 tablespoons of butter in a small saucepan on medium heat and allow it to simmer for 3 minutes until the butter is completely melted. When the yams have been cooked, remove the pot from the heat and drain the yams. Put the yams back in the pot. Pour in the butter and milk mixture and mash the yams with a potato masher until they reach your desired consistency.

Instances.input: make easy ginger apple sundeas
output: 2 medium red cooking apples, cored and sliced    1 teaspoon grated fresh gingerroot or 1/4 teaspoon ground ginger    2 tablespoons butter or margarine    3 tablespoons packed brown sugar    1/3 cup apple juice    1/2 teaspoon cornstarch    2 cups vanilla or cinnamon ice cream     directions    Place a large skillet on grill side burner. In the skillet, cook apples and ginger in butter over medium heat about 3 minutes or until apples are just tender. Stir in brown sugar. In a small bowl, combine apple juice and cornstarch; add to skillet. Cook and stir until thickened and bubbly. Cook and stir for 2 minutes more. Cool slightly.    Scoop ice cream into dessert dishes. Spoon apple mixture over ice cream. Makes 4 servings.

Instances.input: To chop onions
output: Place your onion on a chopping board, remove the top of the onion with a knife, then cut from the top down to the root to cut the onion in half. Peel back the skin and any tough outer layers, then place it on the board cut side down. Use the knife to cut parallel to the chopping board from the top down to the root, from the side furthest from the board to just above it. Do this many times for a fine dice, or just a couple for large sections. Turn the knife around so the sharp blade points down at the board and the point points toward the root, and do the same thing again from left to right. Finally, turn the knife so the blade points down at the board and the point points parallel to the root, and cut slices from the farthest part of the onion away from the root, to close up to the root. Remove the root, and chop the onions with the knife in a rocking motion if need be, holding the blade rightly just above the handle between thumb and forefinger.

Instances.input: How to clean a pod coffee maker?
output: Add a solution of vinegar and water into the water tray and run the coffee maker a few times

Instances.input: To evenly coat the cookies and cream popcorn with candy melts
output: Drizzle half of the candy melts over the popcorn and use a rubber spatula to coat evenly

Instances.input: To dry clothes faster in a dryer.
output: Throw a dry towel into the dryer with your wet clothes. The load will take almost half the time to dry.

Instances.input: How do you make a fly trap?
output: Find a jar and put some sugar water and a paper funnel. The flies will smell the sugar and go down the funnel but wont be able to get out.

Instances.input: How do you break a hole in an old floor?
output: Throw a large weight into a weak area.

Instances.input: How to speed up the cooking time of a spatchcock chicken on the grill?
output: Gather a large brick, wrap it in foil, heat it on the grill and then place it atop the chicken as it cooks

Instances.input: to collect rain to water my garden
output: place barrels outside with no lid

Instances.input: To make money from old books,
output: take the books to a book store and offer to sell them.

Instances.input: How to make hot chocolate.
output: Put your hot chocolate mix in a mug, meanwhile heat 1 cup of water for about 1.5 minutes in microwave, then pour water over hot chocolate mix , ad 3/4 tspn vanilla and mini marshmallows, enjoy.

Instances.input: How do you load a staple gun?
output: Flip the stapler upside down and open the base away from the body. Pull the magazine pusher back to expose the staple channel. Drop the staples into the magazine channel with the points facing up.

Instances.input: To defrost frozen meat safely,
output: take it out of the freezer and place on a plate, so it doesn't drip.  Put the plate in the refrigerator overnight, so the meat can slowly and safely defrost.

Instances.input: To make an ice pack yourself without spending the money.
output: Just soak a clean sponge in water, place it in a zip-top bag, and freeze.

Instances.input: How to make text bold in OneNote
output: Locate the text you wish to make bold, and highlight it. On the top of the screen, click the "B" button to make it bold.
